summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of API Gateway v2 client operations using Moto to mock AWS services. It covers creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion of APIs, authorizers, domain names, integration responses, integrations, mappings, models, reimport functionality, routes, stages, tags, VPC links, and server list handling, ensuring proper handling of both successful and error scenarios.
business_intent: Provide automated verification of the API Gateway v2 implementation to guarantee reliable functionality across all resource types, support continuous integration testing, and catch regressions or misbehaviors in clientâ€‘AWS interactions.
